Name: Hanky Panky Cocktail
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail (go easy - orange oils add unwanted bitterness if overdone).
Review: This is basically a Sweet Martini influenced by the addition of bittersweet and aromatic fernet liqueur .
History: Created in the early 1900s by Ada "Coley" Coleman at The Savoy's American Bar , London, for actor Sir Charles Hawtrey (1858–1923). Recipe adapted from Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Hanky Panky Cocktail contains 174 calories
